attributes.comment:
Please reconsider the changes to the Immigration Benefit Application/ Petition
and Biometric Fee Schedule. I am especially concerned with the increase in fees
for the I-600A and biometrics. The I-171H is only valid for 18 months and
biometrics are only valid for 15 months. Most international adoptions are currently
taking more than 18 months, hence, many adoptive families are having to pay
these fees twice. There is no opportunity to "renew" the I-171H or biometrics at a
lower cost causing an increase in the financial burden of an international adoption.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Melinda McClard
